title: Lufthansa airline group to shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with help of AI, sees stronger profits ahead
description: Lufthansa Group said Monday that it would shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with the help of artificial intelligence, digitalization and consolidating work among member airlines — even as the company reported strong demand for air travel and predicted stronger profits in years ahead.
content: FRANKFURT, Germany — Lufthansa Group said Monday that it would shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with the help of artificial intelligence, digitalization and consolidating work among member airlines — even as the company reported strong demand for air travel a... [1915 chars]

title: Lufthansa airline group to shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with help of AI, sees stronger profits ahead
description: Lufthansa Group has announced plans to cut 4,000 jobs by 2030, focusing on administrative roles. The company aims to achieve this through artificial intelligence, digitalization, and consolidating work among its member airlines.
content: FRANKFURT, Germany (AP) — Lufthansa Group said Monday that it would shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with the help of artificial intelligence, digitalization and consolidating work among member airlines — even as the company reported strong demand for air tra... [1454 chars]

title: Jensen Huang Fires Back At Wall Street 'Flatlining' Nvidia Forecasts, Says AI Demand Will Crush Long-Term Expectations
description: Chipmaker Nvidia Corp.’s (NASDAQ: NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang pushed back against Wall Street's long-term outlook for the company, saying analysts are underestimating the scale of artificial intelligence demand.
content:

title: To survive the AI age, the web needs a new business model
description: Artificial intelligence has undermined the internet’s central bargain

title: SK chief to propose AI ecosystem strategy at APEC CEO Summit
description: SK Group Chairman Chey Tae-won is expected to propose strategies for establishing a sustainable artificial intelligence (AI) ecosystem across Asia-Pacific countries at the 2025 Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Summit, according to a report by Pulse, the English service of Maeil Business Newspaper Korea.

title: Elon Musk's xAI Sues OpenAI Alleging Theft of Trade Secrets with Insider Help
description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company, xAI, has accused rival Sam Altman's OpenAI of stealing trade secrets with the help of former Musk employees, according to new court filings.
content:
Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company, xAI, has accused rival Sam Altman’s OpenAI of stealing trade secrets with the help of former Musk employees, according to new court filings.

title: Tokyo revises flood guidelines amid recent years’ abnormal weather
description: The revision, the first since 2008, incorporates the use of artificial intelligence for risk assessments and updates flood prevention measures.
content: The Tokyo Metropolitan Government has revised its flood prevention guidelines for underground spaces in the capital for the first time in 17 years amid abnormal weather conditions in recent years, with disaster plans updated to include artificial int... [578 chars]

title: Santander uses AI tool to help bust human trafficking gangs in UK
description: High street lender Santander UK has revealed an artificial intelligence (AI) tool used by the bank is helping combat human trafficking after generating hundreds of leads for police to crack gangs operating in Britain.
content:

title: OpenAI to bring parental controls in ChatGPT after California teen's suicide

title: LG Chem develops key liquid material for advanced chip packaging
description: South Korea's LG Chem Ltd. said on Monday it has developed a liquid photo-imageable dielectric (PID), a key insulating material for advanced semiconductor packaging. The company plans to actively target the artificial intelligence (AI) and high-performance semiconductor markets, according to a report by Pulse, the English service of Maeil Business Newspaper Korea.
